item.title: Git checkout private repository inside Docker
item.description: One of the aim of moving project’s deployment to docker, is to be able to build a image on any system without any manual setup. This articles shows how you can clone your private git repos inside a docker image without the need of username and password using SSH keys. Generating the SSH key pairs First we would generate a SSH key pair, which will be used by the docker image
